settingshelpprefixset: Sets the bot's prefix for this server.
settingshelplangset: Sets the language for this server. (Tip: Leave out the language to list all supported languages.)
settingshelpadminrolesset: Adds, removes or removes all roles that have access to admin features of the bot.
settingshelpmodrolesset: Adds, removes or removes all roles that have access to moderator features of the bot.
settingshelpsystemchannelset: Sets the channel for broadcast (e.g. user-join/leave) messages.
settingshelpgreetmsgset: Sets the message that will be sent in the systemchanel when a new user joins the server.
settingshelpbyemsgset: Sets the message that will be sent in the systemchannel when a user leaves the server.
settingshelpjoinrolesset: Adds, removes or removes all roles a new user will get when joining the server.
settingshelpadvice:
Tip: Type the command but leave out any argument to recieve a help message on how to use the exact command.
e.g. *settings greetmsg
prefixmissingargs: Error: Please provide a valid prefix
prefixnotsupported: Error: This prefix is not being supported.
newlangsaved: Your new language has been saved
settingsroleerror:
Error: The role couldn't be found or another error occured.
Please provide the correct ID or name of the role
adminmodmemberaddroleusage:
To add a role to the list use the argument
'add (rolename/roleid)' or 'remove (rolename/roleid)'
To remove all roles, use 'removeall'.
adminrolealreadyadded: Error: This role is already in the list of adminroles.
adminrolenotincluded: Error: The provided role is not in the list of adminroles.
adminroleremoved: The role has been removed from the list of admins
adminrolearrayempty: Error: No adminroles have been saved.
adminrolearraycleared: The list of adminroles has been cleared.
moderatorrolealreadyadded: Error: This role is already in the list of moderatorsroles.
moderatorrolenotincluded: Error: The provided role is not in the list of moderatorroles.
moderatorroleremoved: The role has been removed from the list of moderators
moderatorrolearrayempty: Error: No moderatorroles have been saved.
moderatorrolearraycleared: The list of moderatorroles has been cleared.
systemchannelerror:
Error: The channel couldn't be found or another error occured.
Please provide the correct ID or name of the channel
systemchannelnotset: Error: Couldn't remove systemchannel because there wasn't one set.
systemchannelusage:
To save a channel for broadcasts (join/leave messages etc.) use the argument
'set (channelname/channelid)'
To remove the channel, use 'remove'.
memberaddrolealreadyadded: Fehler: This role is already in the list of join-roles.
memberaddrolealnotincluded: Fehler: Die angegebene Rolle befindet sich nicht in der Liste der Beitritts-Rollen.
memberaddroleremoved: Die Rolle wurde von der Liste der Beitritts-Rollen entfernt
memberaddrolearrayempty: Fehler: Es wurden keine Beitritts-Rollen abgespeichert.
memberaddrolearraycleared: Die Liste der Beitritts-Rollen wurde gel√∂scht.
msgnotset: Error: Couldn't remove the msg because there wasn't one set.
msgremoved: The message has been removed and the feature disabled.
greetmsgusage:
To save a message that will be sent when a new member joins the server use the argument
'set *message*'
To remove the message, use 'remove'.
Include the word 'username' in your message to replace it with the user's name and 'servername' to replace it with your server's name.
greetmsgsystemchannelnotset: Error: Please set a systemchannel first!
byemsgusage:
To save a message that will be sent when member leaves the server use the argument
'set *message*'
To remove the message, use 'remove'.
Include the word 'username' in your message to replace it with the user's name and 'servername' to replace it with your server's name.
argtoolong: Error: Argument too long. Please try again with a shorter message.
owneronlyerror: This command is owner only. What did you think?!
Security does not let you in.
Gotcha! You are not going to harm anyone!
usermissperm: You do not have enough permission to do this.
Sorry but no. The owner of this server does not want to let you do this.
You are not allowed to do this.
